What Are Instagram Marketing Services In India?

Instagram management services are the services that build, develop and handle your Instagram organic and paid campaigns. Instagram management includes organic and paid management of any business or individual profile. Our Instagram management services offer you complete Instagram profile management including postings, comment monitoring, running paid campaigns, monitoring and reporting of campaigns etc.

Complete Instagram Marketing & Management Services

Instagram marketing includes a wide range of services aimed at promoting businesses and individuals on the platform. Here are some common services that fall under Instagram marketing

Strategy development

Developing a comprehensive Instagram marketing strategy tailored to the business goals and target audience.

Content creation

Creating visually appealing and engaging content, including photos, videos, graphics, and captions.

Account management

Managing and maintaining an active Instagram account, including posting content, responding to comments and messages, and engaging with followers.

Influencer marketing

Collaborating with influencers to promote products or services, reaching a wider audience and increasing brand exposure.

Hashtag research

Identifying relevant and popular hashtags to increase discoverability and reach on Instagram.

Advertising campaigns

Running targeted advertising campaigns on Instagram to increase brand visibility, drive website traffic, or generate leads and sales.

Instagram Stories

Creating captivating and interactive Stories to engage followers and share behind-the-scenes content, promotions, or announcements.

IGTV (Instagram TV)

Creating and publishing longer-form video content on IGTV, allowing for more in-depth storytelling or educational content.

Instagram Live

Hosting live video sessions to connect with followers in real-time, answer questions, and share exclusive content or events.

Community management

Engaging with the Instagram community, responding to comments, messages, and mentions, and fostering relationships with followers.

Analytics and reporting

Tracking and analyzing Instagram metrics, such as follower growth, engagement rate, reach, and conversions, to measure the success of marketing efforts and make data-driven decisions.

Social listening

Monitoring and analyzing conversations and mentions related to the brand or industry on Instagram, gathering insights and understanding customer sentiment.

E-commerce integration

Leveraging Instagram's shopping features, such as product tagging, to enable direct purchasing within the platform.

Contest and giveaway management:

Organizing and running contests or giveaways on Instagram to increase engagement, attract new followers, and reward existing ones.

Instagram Insights and performance optimization

Using data and analytics to optimize strategies, identify trends, and refine the approach for better results.

Instagram Is More Than Hashtags And Pictures

Leverage the power of one of the most amazing and growing social media platforms ‘Instagram’ to foster your brand’s identity through quality Instagram marketing services in India.

What Instagram marketing agency can do for you?

Instagram Marketing Services

Strategy development

An Instagram marketing company will work with clients to develop a customized strategy that aligns with their marketing goals. This includes identifying target audiences, determining content themes, and establishing objectives.

Advertising campaigns

Instagram offers various advertising options, such as sponsored posts, story ads, and carousel ads. An Instagram marketing company can develop and manage targeted advertising campaigns to maximize exposure, reach new audiences, and drive conversions.

Content creation

Creating engaging and visually appealing content is crucial for Instagram success. The marketing company may offer services such as photography, graphic design, video production, and copywriting to ensure the client's content stands out and resonates with their audience.

Analytics and reporting

Monitoring and analyzing Instagram metrics is essential to measure the effectiveness of marketing efforts. The company will provide regular reports on key performance indicators (KPIs), such as follower growth, engagement rate, reach, and conversions. They can use this data to refine strategies and optimize results.

Account management

The company may manage and optimize the client's Instagram account on their behalf. This involves activities like posting content, scheduling posts, engaging with followers, responding to comments, and monitoring analytics to track performance.

Trend analysis

Staying up to date with the latest Instagram trends and features is crucial for success. An Instagram marketing company will stay informed about platform updates, algorithm changes, and emerging trends, ensuring their clients are aware of new opportunities to engage their audience.

Why Should You Use Instagram Advertising Services?

An Instagram marketing company aims to enhance a client’s online presence, increase brand awareness, drive traffic to their website, and ultimately generate leads and sales through strategic and targeted Instagram marketing efforts. Instagram is being used by millions of people who have an interest in fashion, travel, food, art and crafts mainly. If your business is related to any one of these industries then Instagram will give you better results if you choose to advertise your brand on Instagram. Instagram content drives traffic more than any other visual social content platform like Youtube or Pinterest. Moreover, Instagram offers increased opportunities for repeat purchases. Instagram can drive more targeted and relevant traffic to your website. You can also use your old marketing materials like photos, graphics and other photos to reuse for sharing on Instagram. And the traffic you will get from photos will have high engagement.
View Instagram Marketing Packages

More Reasons to Use Instagram Advertising Services

  • Instagram has over 1.2 billion monthly active users, and over 500 million people use the platform daily.
  • 71% of US businesses use Instagram for marketing.
  • The most followed Instagram account is Instagram's own account, with over 400 million followers.
  • The most popular Instagram content is food-related, followed by travel and fashion.
  • 81% of people use Instagram to research products or services, and 80% of users follow at least one business on the platform.
  • 90% of users on Instagram follow at least one business account.
  • Instagram has the highest engagement rate of all social media platforms, with an average engagement rate of 1.22%.
  • Instagram influencers with over 100,000 followers can make over $1000 per sponsored post.
  • Instagram Stories have over 500 million daily active users.
  • 62% of people say they have become more interested in a brand or product after seeing it in Instagram Stories.

Our Instagram Advertising Campaigns Include

It becomes difficult for businesses and individuals to manage their Instagram marketing campaigns due to a busy schedule, and this is where RankON Technologies helps you to manage your Instagram ads for better growth at very affordable monthly Instagram marketing packages.

Brand Awareness

The Brand Awareness objective is ideal for businesses that want to increase the visibility of their brand. It focuses on getting your brand in front of as many people as possible. This objective is best suited for companies that are new to the market or have just launched a new product or service.

Traffic

"Traffic" is a type of Facebook Ads objective that focuses on driving more traffic to your website or landing page. When you select "Traffic" as your objective, Facebook's algorithm will optimize your ad delivery to show your ad to people who are more likely to click through to your website or landing page.

Engagement

"Engagement" is a type of Facebook Ads objective that focuses on getting people to engage with your ad or content, such as liking, commenting, or sharing. When you select "Engagement" as your objective, Facebook's algorithm will optimize your ad delivery to show your ad to people who are more likely to engage with your content.

Lead Generation

"Lead Generation" is a type of Facebook Ads objective that focuses on collecting leads from your target audience. When you select "Lead Generation" as your objective, Facebook's algorithm will optimize your ad delivery to show your ad to people who are more likely to provide their contact information in exchange for an offer, such as an e-book or webinar.

App Promotion

"App Installs" is a type of Facebook Ads objective that focuses on getting more people to install your mobile app. When you select "App Installs" as your objective, Facebook's algorithm will optimize your ad delivery to show your ad to people who are more likely to download and install your app.

Sales Objective

"Catalog Sales" is a type of Facebook Ads objective that focuses on promoting products from your e-commerce catalog and driving sales on your website or app. When you select "Catalog Sales" as your objective, Facebook's algorithm will optimize your ad delivery to show your ads to people who are more likely to make a purchase.

how to hire the best Instagram Marketing company

To hire the best Instagram marketing company for your needs, consider the following steps

Define your goals

Before seeking out a marketing company, clearly define your goals and expectations. Identify what you want to achieve through Instagram marketing, whether it's increasing brand awareness, driving website traffic, or generating sales. Having a clear vision will help you find a company that aligns with your objectives.

Research and shortlist companies

Conduct thorough research to identify Instagram marketing companies that have a strong reputation, positive client testimonials, and a track record of delivering successful campaigns. Look for companies with experience in your industry or niche.

Evaluate expertise

Review the services and expertise offered by each company. Consider their experience in Instagram marketing, the range of services they provide (content creation, influencer partnerships, advertising, etc.), and their knowledge of Instagram's algorithm and best practices.

Check portfolio and case studies

Examine the company's portfolio and case studies to assess the quality of their work and the results they have achieved for their clients. Look for examples that resonate with your brand's style and objectives.

Assess their communication and collaboration approach

Effective communication and collaboration are essential for a successful partnership. Evaluate how responsive and attentive the company is during the initial stages of contact. Consider their approach to collaboration, whether they involve you in the strategy development process and seek your input.

Inquire about reporting and analytics

Ask about their reporting and analytics capabilities. A reputable Instagram marketing company should provide regular reports on key metrics and performance indicators. Understand how they measure success and track the progress of campaigns.

Consider their pricing structure

Inquire about their pricing structure and ensure it aligns with your budget and expectations. Be cautious of companies that offer unrealistically low prices, as quality and results may be compromised. Request a detailed breakdown of costs and any additional fees that may apply.

Seek references and client testimonials

Ask for references or seek out client testimonials and reviews. Contact previous or current clients to gain insights into their experiences with the company. This can provide valuable information about the company's professionalism, communication, and ability to deliver results.

Schedule consultations

Narrow down your list to a few top candidates and schedule consultations or meetings. This will give you an opportunity to discuss your goals, ask specific questions, and assess the company's expertise and compatibility with your brand.

Trust your instincts

Finally, trust your instincts when making a decision. Consider the company's enthusiasm, understanding of your brand, and the chemistry between your team and theirs. A strong working relationship is crucial for a successful partnership.

Frequently Asked Questions About Instagram Marketing Services

How do I start Instagram marketing?

To get started with Instagram Marketing, you need to connect to an experienced and skilled Instagram Marketing Agency that has a decent track record and has already helped a big number of businesses excel in their respective domains through Instagram.

What is an Instagram marketing agency?

An Instagram Marketing Agency is a team of experienced professionals who helps businesses thrive on Instagram.

Can Instagram pay you?

Instagram can prove to be immensely lucrative to businesses after one point of time. Businesses with over 10,000 followers can make, on average, $88.00 per post, whereas businesses with 100,000 followers make $200.00 per post.

How can I get 1000 followers on Instagram?

To get 1000+ followers on Instagram, you need to:

  • Have an optimized profile
  • Opt for a skilled content creator
  • Make use of the best photography practices
  • Make a regular posting schedule
  • Keep a consistent voice
  • Write engaging, shareable captions
How does Instagram marketing work?

Instagram Marketing is the process of promoting a business on the Free Instagram App. This includes publishing quality content either through generalized content or sponsored posts to reach and influence a bigger audience base.

How much does a social media marketer cost?

The social media marketer costs ranges between 165 USD to 480 USD. However, the choice of package depends upon the size of business. For start-ups it is about 165 USD, for small businesses it is 330 USD and for large businesses it is 480 USD.

How much should I pay someone to run my Instagram?

You must only and only rely on a professional and an experienced Instagram Marketing Agency to run your Instagram account. The cost to hire an Instagram Marketing Agency may vary between 165 USD to 480 USD.

How much should I pay someone to manage my Instagram?

You must only and only rely on a professional and an experienced Instagram Marketing Agency to run your Instagram account. The cost to hire an RankON Technologies to manage your Instagram may vary between 165 USD to 480 USD per month.

How much does Instagram pay you for 1 million followers?

Instagram account holders with over 1 Million followers are known as mega influencers. They make more than 11.4 lac per month.
